dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5316 IH: To authorize appropriations for the seniors farmers’ market nutrition program for fiscal years 2019 through 2023.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Faso introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To authorize appropriations for the seniors farmers’ market nutrition program for fiscal years 2019 through 2023.

section.text: Section 4402(a) of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 (7 U.S.C. 3007(a)) is amended striking 2018 and inserting 2023.
